title: Pony Rock! (ft. GalaxySquid & NekoSnicker)
album: Carousel (An Examination of the Shadow, Creekflow, and its Life as an Afterthought)
lyrics: It’s a brand new day again
Brushing the dreams from my mane
As it was meant to be
So there’s no need to rush
It cradled you through your sleep
And the dreams that you lived are yours today
Wrapping winter, for you to reap
Like it was mine, o’ mine
Know your place, you flew too high
Spring will fade as fast as it came
As it was meant to be
So there’s no need to rush
